feed.title: The Doucet Lab â€” Structural Biology & Protein Engineering
feed.subtitle: We explore how proteins work at the molecular level and use this knowledge to design new biomolecules with therapeutic potential. Our research combines structural biology, NMR spectroscopy, nanobody engineering, and AI-powered protein design to reveal mechanisms of disease and create innovative solutions in biotechnology.
